text: Nummah moominiiney isin Nabii Ibraahim kee moominiinik ka창 lih yen marat meqe katayyu luk tenen ken kataytaanamal, usun sinni maray koroositek: diggah nanu sin kee isin Yall창 kalah uqbuddu haytaanamak bari kinninooh, isin koroosannuk elle taniinim nengeddeeh, nee kee sin fanat qadaawat kee naqbi umman yanim tumbulleh, Yallal dubuk eemenni haytaanam fanah, kinnih immay Nabii Ibraahim isi abbak iyye maxc처 kay katayyut ma culta, diggah dambi cabti koh essereyyooh, Yallak tu koh maxiqa kaak iyye waqdih maxco kinni, Ni Rabbow kol kelitneeh, koo fanah nuduure (toobah) kaadu ni Rabbow Qhiyaamah ayr처 gacim Koo fanah yakke
